short_summary: Technical university is looking for data science tools to enhance its innovation offerings.
description: This Request for Quote (RFQ) is issued pursuant to the technical university's Data Science Tools (DST) Arrangement. The DST Arrangement forms part of the series of Arrangements issued by the Technical University with the number. The terms and conditions in the DST Arrangement apply to and form part of this RFQ. Bidders who submit a bid agree to be bound by those terms and conditions as well as the terms and conditions in this RFQ. Note: please email for a copy of the corresponding request for information or other documentation.

full_summary:
## Tender Announcement #1: Furniture for Workspaces

**Public Notice (AVIS DU GOUVERNEMENT)**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the delivery of furniture for workspaces.

**Contract Details (DÉTAILS DU CONTRAT)**

* **Project Title**: Furniture for Workspaces
* **Contract Reference Number**: cb-414-37258697
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: R00000158391

**Submission Deadline (DATE DE CLÔTURE)**

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-06T14:00:00
* **Dates to Note**: Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-26, Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-29

**Notice Type (TIPE D'AVIS)**

* This Request for Proposal (RFP) is a part of the Supplier’s Furniture for Workspaces Supply Arrangement (SA), number E60PQ-140003/PQ, issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada. The terms and conditions of the SA apply to this RFP.

**procurement Method (méthode d'approvisionnement)**

* **Methodology**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Important Information**

* For additional information, please email Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca.
* For a copy of the Workstation Layout, please email Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca as well.

**Attachments (Pièces jointes)**

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30568/r158391-english.pdf,
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30568/r158391-french.pdf.

This announcement has been translated into French for the benefit of potential bidders who do not speak English. VIENNES UNIQUEMENT POUR LA BONNE OUTERANCE. The Competition Policy and Procedures will be used to ensure that the process is transparent, and fair.

Please note that this announcement is subject to change, and bidders should confirm the details before submission.

---

Please note that I did not include any details about trade agreements, regions of opportunity, and other specific data not relevant to the project. If your managers needs to access that information, it is part of the original dataset above.
